answerText: Haroun and the Sea of Stories[10] Haroun and the Sea of Stories was written by this novelist, whose other works include Shame, The Moor's Last Sigh, and Shalimar the Clown.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | Finals 1 | 16 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The title character of this work helps the talkative Guppies win a war against the wicked Chupwalas, led by Khattam-Shud. For 10 points each: [10] Name this work in which Rashid loses his ability to tell tales after his wife leaves him, prompting his son to travel with the genie Iff to the moon Kahani
